translations: v．消失，不见：从视线、记忆或存在中消失。
· The sun disappears behind the clouds.

sentences.sentence: If the world disappears, you will disappear.
sentences.translation: 如果世界消失，你就会消失。

sentences.sentence: Repair of damaged cells takes about two days and afterwards, the soreness disappears.
sentences.translation: 修复受损的细胞大约需要两天，之后疼痛就会消失。

sentences.sentence: Perhaps I may be able once more to see the round red sun before he entirely disappears.
sentences.translation: 也许在圆圆的红日完全消失之前，我还能再看到它一眼。
